channel.title: Blogs on Odyssey of Julius
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Odyssey of Julius

item.title: Exploring the Woods and Dropping the Bike
item.description: Mind blowing realizations Wet stuff is slippery (WHAT!?) Good boots are important, your foot can get caught beneath 200kilos of bike (surprised pikachu face) 200kg is heavy (physics never seize to baffle me) Intro My girlfriend surprised me one day with an invitation to go mushroom picking. Now, I have to admit, I’m not particularly fond of mushrooms, and at that moment, the allure of staying in and being lazy was strong.
